title: Pinboard
description: Pinboard uses a distinctive blue color (#0000E6) which is associated with trust, reliability, and calmness. This color choice is well-suited to its service of offering a clutter-free and minimalist social bookmarking experience, resonating with users who appreciate simplicity and organization in their digital space. The brand's completely online presence and its emphasis on user-centric web functionality have helped establish these color associations.
